Definition: Set as 0 by default. Minimum RM.

Maximum RM. Since the model is solving for least cost, it will not "overbuild" without a good reason for it. We don't want to disallow overbuild, which setting an upper limit would do. Therefore, it is kept blank.
Percentage of peak demand. Used to derive capacity credit of transmission.
Capacity of the technology that is allocted to provide reliable and stable power. It is measured over period of critical conditions, such as peak load.
